item.description:
The 24th Annual Boston Gay and Lesbian Film/Video Festival

The Boston Dyke March is proud to sponsor:

May 18, 2008: she's a boy i knew
For more info, please see the MFA site.

Ticket Prices (Please see MFA site for more details. Subject to change here.)

Ticket Prices: (please consult MFA to be sure.)
MFA members, seniors and students, $8; general admission $10.
Exceptions: Women's Opening Night, May $12 for MFA members, seniors and students and $15 for general admission. Closing Night, May 18, MFA members, seniors and students, $10, general admission $12; Matinee programs before 5 pm weekdays or 12:30 pm weekends: MFA members, seniors and students, $6 and general admission $7.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: She's a Boy I Knew at The 24th Annual Boston Gay and Lesbian Film/Video Festival
